program.name: Harris County RIDES
program.website_description: Discounted rides on public transit for seniors and people with disabilities
program.description:
Discounted rides on public transit. If you're 65 or older or have a disability and/or unable to access METRO services, you may qualify for subsidized shared rides and taxi fares through the use of a fare card. There is no limit for qualified individuals.

Get an electronic fare card from a sponsoring agency or the RIDES office. For every $3 loaded, $6 is available on the fare card.

documents.text: Proof of identity (ex: driver's license, official state ID card)
